title: Let me reconnect permantly RIOT!
body: I was just playing a fun game with friends when suddenly I disconnected. Then i reconnected. Then I disconnected again. Then I reconnected again. This process  repeated itself another 10 times and before I knew it... we lost the game. Riot please just  fix the game, I know your busy and I know you have a lot to do (making skins, balancing champions etc) when there is a problem just try and fix it as soon as possible.

replies.body: Are you having issues still? Is there anything wrong with your internet connection?
